body:
TC failed with this error during lint setup:

```
Receiving objects:   0% (1/17296)   
error: RPC failed; curl 56 GnuTLS recv error (-24): Decryption has failed.
fatal: The remote end hung up unexpectedly
fatal: early EOF
```

Looks like an intermittent to me. @rhelmer can you repush this to try again?
